What neighbors! Richebourg is bounded on the south by Romanée-Conti and the east by Romanée St. Vivant. Less than 2,000 cases are produced per year; generally it is fuller, deeper in color and “‘bigger” than its adjoining vineyards in the town of Vosne-Romanée. Most of this vineyard is owned by the Domaine de la Romanée-Conti.
